cards: Would you rather lose your phone for a week or your wallet for a day?
Would you rather be famous for something embarrassing or stay unknown forever?
Would you rather only be able to whisper or only be able to shout?
Would you rather always be overdressed or always be underdressed?
Would you rather live without music or without TV/movies?
Would you rather have to tell the truth all the time or never be able to speak again?
Would you rather accidentally send a risky text to your boss or to your parents?
Would you rather have your search history made public or your private messages?
